means: <贬>有始无终的人，虎头蛇尾的人，半途而废者

sentence.Network_en: He is a quitter who is temperamentally unsuited to remaining a champion.
sentence.Network_cn: 他是个遇难而退的人，照他的性格，不可能长期保住冠军的称号。

sentence.Network_en: He won't resign because he's not a quitter.
sentence.Network_cn: 他不会辞职的，因为他不是一个轻言放弃的人。

sentence.Network_en: He was tagged as a quitter.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(Q) ... quittance 免除 quitter 懒人 quittor 马蹄疽.
一些时下很潮词的翻译 ... （俚语）；妖娆女子 cheese cake 懦夫 quitter （俚语） 母校 alma mater.
quintuor〔法〕五重奏（唱）。quitter〔法〕放开、脱离、中断。quittez〔法〕同上。
以q开头的英语英文单词 ... quite 很，十分 quitter 遇困难即放弃者 quiver (轻微地)颤动.

list.abs: winners never quit , quitters never win .从不放弃的人不会被打败。
dave in the membership office handles quitters ., 戴夫在成员资格办公室办理退会.
quitters never win and winner never quit ., 退缩者永无胜利 , 胜利者永不退缩.
I am a fighter , not a quitter ., 我是一个斗士 , 不是一个懦夫.

entry.tran: 轻易放弃的人；半途而废的人
entry.def: If you say that someone is not a quitter, you mean that they continue doing something even though it is very difficult.

example.ex: He won't resign because he's not a quitter.
example.tran: 他不会辞职的，因为他不是一个轻言放弃的人。

means.word_mean: 1. a person who gives up too easily

auth_sentence.content: "I have never been a quitter," said Nixon.
auth_sentence.res_content: "I have never been a quitter," said Nixon.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: "I have never been a quitter," said Nixon.

auth_sentence.content: For every eight people who use varenicline, one will become a long-term quitter.
